title: alterra57
author: alterra57
content: As title says. This will be a one time trade only as I do not like PayPal, just had to get this payment through there. Can pay a rate up to 2% in your favor. Reply with your Telegram username or contact me here.As always, scammers stay away please, don't waste my time.

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: Quote from: ChangeBTC on February 23, 2023, 02:40:34 AMCan you do 100$?I apologize but I cannot. I'd like to do it all at once.
